name: Lost in Space (itch) (Waltico games)
description:
This is a great space shooter game, when you are in action the rules that govern the world are never the same. whether you are evading bullets from your enemies or taking care of your health you are inmerse in a world of danger, the important factor of score can create a great video game time. Join a group of friends and gamble 2 dollars for the best score, you will enjoy being the best, plus two dollars in your pocket.

It is the price of the game!

visit my music channel:

https://www.reverbnation.com/thevelvetmachine

Waltico Games!

Walter Hernández Santiago
